data.text: Why the heck does my boss give me more work than I can handle. I'm overwhelmed.
This sucks and I want to punch the world
I really want to break something right now

speech: Change starts with us as individuals. If one individual becomes more compassionate it will influence others and so we will change the world.
Meaningful dialogue requires us to respect others' rights and interests—compromise is the only way to resolve disputes.
We think that if we have health and wealth they’re enough to be happy, but actually happiness depends on the state of our minds.
Genuine peace in the world depends on our having peace in our hearts. If we are full of anger how can we expect to bring about peace.
